channel.title: Help with "NEED ITEM TO USE OBJECT"
channel.description:
how do i make so u use (im making jail, theres a window u can press on) i want it to make u get out (tele) but you need to have 100m to get out, how do i do?
P.S i havent coded for 6 months i dont remember lol

item.title: Help with "NEED ITEM TO USE OBJECT"
item.dc:creator: @devenb123 devenb123
item.description:
@devenb123 wrote:

ok figure out the objects id then add this to actionhandler

case 4150:
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(955,100000000)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(2606, 3154, 0);
c.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=4000>You Have Left Jail!");
break;

change 4150 to the objects id i think that will workâ€¦ try it

Read full topic
item.source: Help with "NEED ITEM TO USE OBJECT"
